title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7847.2 - Publication of draft plan
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7847.2 - Publication of draft plan

State Regulations
A copy of the draft plan shall be posted on the State

Energy Plan website. A copy of the draft plan and all non-confidential
information and comments filed with the board shall be made available to the
public for inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7847.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
